subject: We'Re All In A Sinking Boat
text:
McCain thinks these past eight years have been great, he needs to open his eyes.
When I think about how Bush has ran this country, it's something that I despise.
Things would be much better if they had recounted all of Al Gore's votes.
But they put a stop to the recount and now we're all in a sinking boat.
If people vote for John McCain, it will not be a good move.
If McCain wins, the recession will continue and the economy won't improve.
I love this country and I will not lie to you.
A vote for McCain is like a vote for Bush and that is true.
